title: Kaplpitya 2 Acre Lagoon Front Property With Running Business
details: This 2 Acre Property, Consisting Of 7 Beautiful Cabanas With A Large Lagoon Front Is At Present Rented To A Foreign National Who Is Doing Training For Kite Surfers. Its A Rare Oppertunity To Get A Such A Beautiful Piece Of Land Overlooking The Lagoon. Ideal For The Next Buyer To Upgrade To The Next Level.
